TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]率先发现者获得一项[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]免费科技[COLOR_REVERT]从你现在或更早的时代当中
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]率先发现者获得一项[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]免费科技[COLOR_REVERT]从你现在或更早的时代当中
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives a [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Free Technology[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]率先发现者自动获得%d1_Num项[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]免费科技[COLOR_REVERT]从你现在或更早的时代当中
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]率先发现者自动获得%d1_Num项[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]免费科技[COLOR_REVERT]从你现在或更早的时代当中
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] Free Technologies[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era
An enemy unit has been enslaved!

TEXT.English: 我国%s1的部分人口移民新大陆！
TEXT.Chinese: 我国%s1的部分人口移民新大陆！
TEXT.French: A part of our population from %s1 is emigrating to the New World!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]建成一座印度教神庙后创立
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]建成一座印度教神庙后创立
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Founded when a Hindu Temple is built

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]建立时基督教文明控制着少于一半的基督教城市[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]或者由一个不控制东正教圣城的文明建造东正教大教堂
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]建立时基督教文明控制着少于一半的基督教城市[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]或者由一个不控制东正教圣城的文明建造东正教大教堂
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Founded when Christian civilizations control less than half of all Christian cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Alternately founded by the first civilization to build an Orthodox Cathedral without controlling the Orthodox holy city

TEXT.English: %D1_Mod%%: 与其他文明首都的交易
TEXT.Chinese: %D1_Mod%%: 与其他文明首都的交易

TEXT.English: %D1_Mod%%: 与防御协定伙伴的交易
TEXT.Chinese: %D1_Mod%%: 与防御协定伙伴的交易
TEXT.French: %D1_Mod%%: for trading with Defensive Pact partner

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]交易资源减少时不降低稳定度
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]交易资源减少时不降低稳定度
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]No negative Stability Points for low amount of traded resources
[ICON_BULLET]+2 additional Stability Points on city conquest

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change 每个核心城市赠送免费专家
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change 每个核心城市赠送免费专家

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]城市驻军一单位，提升%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad，上限为%D3
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]城市驻军一单位，提升%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad，上限为%D3
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad per Military Unit Stationed in a City up to a Maximum of %D3

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_COMMERCE] 在首都，对于每个附庸城市
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_COMMERCE] 在首都，对于每个附庸城市
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_COMMERCE] in Capital for every Vassal City

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_COMMERCE] 在首都，对于每个殖民地
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_COMMERCE] 在首都，对于每个殖民地

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]每收纳一个附庸国稳定点数+4
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]每收纳一个附庸国稳定点数+4

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]每控制一个文明发源地稳定点数+4
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]每控制一个文明发源地稳定点数+4
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+4 Stability Points for each civilization starting point controlled

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]每座城市只能入驻一种公司[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]改变共产主义经济制度将导致经济危机
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]每座城市只能入驻一种公司[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]改变共产主义经济制度将导致经济危机
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]No more than one corporation per city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Post-communist crisis in case of economic system switch

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]能够将产能转换为贸易%D1_Mod%%效率
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]能够将产能转换为贸易%D1_Mod%%效率
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Can convert production to commerce with %D1_Mod%% efficiency

TEXT.English: [SPACE]每个城市中的每个专家最多在%d1个地块上工作
TEXT.Chinese: [SPACE]每个城市中的每个专家最多在%d1个地块上工作
TEXT.French: [SPACE]per Specialist for every city that works at most %d1 land tiles
[ICON_BULLET]No Additional Income from Foreign Trade Routes

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]每建立一个距离首都15格以上的城市时，稳定点数+2
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]每建立一个距离首都15格以上的城市时，稳定点数+2
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+2 additional Stability Points for each city founded at least 15 tiles from the capital

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% 来自防御协定盟友的收入 [ICON_TRADE]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% 来自防御协定盟友的收入 [ICON_TRADE]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Income from [ICON_TRADE] with Defensive Pact partners

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% 产生收入于 [ICON_TRADE] 经过你首都的
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% 产生收入于 [ICON_TRADE] 经过你首都的
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Income from [ICON_TRADE] going through your Capital

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]从现在或更早的时代当中，获得1项免费科技
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]从现在或更早的时代当中，获得1项免费科技
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]1 Free Technology From Your Current Or Earlier Eras

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]从现在或更早的时代当中，获得%d1_Num项免费科技
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]从现在或更早的时代当中，获得%d1_Num项免费科技
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_Num Free Technologies From Your Current Or Earlier Eras

TEXT.English: 移除%s2附近的一处%s1，并为你的国库带来了%d3[ICON_GOLD]的收入。
TEXT.Chinese: 移除%s2附近的一处%s1，并为你的国库带来了%d3[ICON_GOLD]的收入。
TEXT.French: Removing a %s1 near your city of %s2 has created %d3 [ICON_GOLD] for your treasury.

TEXT.English: 我们自天主教国家%d1收取了什一税
TEXT.Chinese: 我们自天主教国家%d1收取了什一税
TEXT.French: We have collected a tithe of %d1 from the Catholic world.
A %s1 embassy has been established in

TEXT.English: 你已爬出谷底并重掌%s1的统治权。现在好好给敌人们上一课！
TEXT.Chinese: 你已爬出谷底并重掌%s1的统治权。现在好好给敌人们上一课！
TEXT.French: You have escaped and regained control of %s1 territory. Now let's teach our enemies a lesson!
You have escaped and regained control of

TEXT.English: 的统治权。现在好好给敌人上一课！
TEXT.Chinese: 的统治权。现在好好给敌人上一课！
TEXT.French: territory. Now let's teach our enemies a lesson!

TEXT.English: 你已被%s1:2抓获并流放到偏远的%s2之地。你必须在短时间内夺回首都以恢复权力。
TEXT.Chinese: 你已被%s1:2抓获并流放到偏远的%s2之地。你必须在短时间内夺回首都以恢复权力。
TEXT.French: You have been captured by the %s1:2 and exiled to the unimportant lands of %s2. You have a short period of time for retaking your capital and gain back your position.
You have been captured by the
and exiled to the unimportant lands of

TEXT.English: 。你必须在短时间内夺回首都以恢复权力。
TEXT.Chinese: 。你必须在短时间内夺回首都以恢复权力。
TEXT.French: . You have a short period of time for retaking your capital and gain back your position.

TEXT.English: 地理大发现：来自遥远大陆的征服者开始入侵我们的领土，疯狂掠取财富！
TEXT.Chinese: 地理大发现：来自遥远大陆的征服者开始入侵我们的领土，疯狂掠取财富！
TEXT.French: Conquerors from a far away continent are invading our lands searching for wealth!

TEXT.English: 地理大发现：我国的一支探险队已经抵达新大陆，寻找传说中的财富！
TEXT.Chinese: 地理大发现：我国的一支探险队已经抵达新大陆，寻找传说中的财富！
TEXT.French: A group of our own adventurers has arrived in the new world searching for wealth!

TEXT.English: 我们的部分军队加入了叛乱者，为他们的独立而战！
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的部分军队加入了叛乱者，为他们的独立而战！
TEXT.French: Some of our forces are joining the enemy to help their war of liberation!

TEXT.English: 敌人的部分军队决定反戈一击，为我们的独立而战！
TEXT.Chinese: 敌人的部分军队决定反戈一击，为我们的独立而战！
TEXT.French: Some of our enemy's forces are joining us to help our war of liberation!

TEXT.English: 拒绝他们的要求，这意味着战争！
TEXT.Chinese: 拒绝他们的要求，这意味着战争！
TEXT.French: We refused the flip, this means war!

TEXT.English: 一些地方的城市加入了我们正在崛起的帝国！
TEXT.Chinese: 一些地方的城市加入了我们正在崛起的帝国！
TEXT.French: Cities in the area have joined our rising empire!

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE]一个渴求独立的新文明。如果我们拒绝可能导致战争的爆发及部分军队的叛离。我们要给予他们自由吗？
TEXT.Chinese: [NEWLINE]一个渴求独立的新文明。如果我们拒绝可能导致战争的爆发及部分军队的叛离。我们要给予他们自由吗？
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE]want to flip to a rising civilization. Our refusal may lead to a war and some of our troops may join it. Should we let them go?

TEXT.English: %D1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: “入驻的大艺术家向我们提供各项娱乐！”
TEXT.Chinese: %D1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: “入驻的大艺术家向我们提供各项娱乐！”
TEXT.French: %D1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "Our specialists increase the prestige of our city!"

TEXT.English: 能够花费黄金来完成建筑生产
TEXT.Chinese: 能够花费黄金来完成建筑生产
TEXT.French: Can Spend Gold to Finish Building Production in a City

TEXT.English: 能够花费黄金来组建军事单位
TEXT.Chinese: 能够花费黄金来组建军事单位
TEXT.French: Can Spend Gold to Finish Military Unit Production in a City

TEXT.English: 一些城市宣布脱离外来统治独立建国！
TEXT.Chinese: 一些城市宣布脱离外来统治独立建国！
TEXT.French: cities have declared independence from their foreign domination!

TEXT.English: %s1人宣布脱离外来统治独立建国！
TEXT.Chinese: %s1人宣布脱离外来统治独立建国！
TEXT.French: %s1 cities have declared their independence from their foreign domination!

TEXT.English: 水路贸易让我们带来了 %d1 [ICON_GOLD] !
TEXT.Chinese: 水路贸易让我们带来了 %d1 [ICON_GOLD] !
TEXT.French: The trade passing through our waters brings %d1 [ICON_GOLD] to our treasury!

TEXT.English: %s1的军队已经入侵了我国领土！
TEXT.Chinese: %s1的军队已经入侵了我国领土！

TEXT.English: 你的霍坎武士打败了 %s1 %s2, 获得 %d3 [ICON_FOOD] %s4.
TEXT.Chinese: 你的霍坎武士打败了 %s1 %s2, 获得 %d3 [ICON_FOOD] %s4.
TEXT.French: Your Holkan has defeated a %s1 %s2, acquiring %d3 [ICON_FOOD] for %s4.

TEXT.English: 民族主义的兴起改变了军队的构成：雇佣军已经不合时宜！
TEXT.Chinese: 民族主义的兴起改变了军队的构成：雇佣军已经不合时宜！
TEXT.French: Nationalism has changed the conception of armies: Mercenaries no longer fit in!

TEXT.English: 你的宗教审判从%s1_city移除了%s2_religion，并且在异教徒处收取了%d3_gold[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.Chinese: 你的宗教审判从%s1_city移除了%s2_religion，并且在异教徒处收取了%d3_gold[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.French: Your persecutor has successfully purged %s2_religion from %s1_city and confiscated %d3_gold[ICON_GOLD] from the victims.

TEXT.English: 你在%s1_city的宗教审判没有成功。
TEXT.Chinese: 你在%s1_city的宗教审判没有成功。

TEXT.English: 在%s2年，一位%s1在科尔多瓦清真寺建成后诞生!
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s2年，一位%s1在科尔多瓦清真寺建成后诞生!
TEXT.French: A %s1 has been born after the construction of La Mezquita in %s2!

TEXT.English: Our source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] near %s2_CityName has been exhausted!
TEXT.Chinese: Our source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] near %s2_CityName has been exhausted!
TEXT.French: Our source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] near %s2_CityName has been exhausted!
[ICON_BULLET]%D1%%[ICON_PRODUCTION] for having the current building in your capital

TEXT.English: 你的间谍到达了大间谍的地位！
TEXT.Chinese: 你的间谍到达了大间谍的地位！
TEXT.French: Your Spy has reached the status of a Great Spy!

TEXT.English: 蒙古游牧部落入侵了%s1_civ_adjective领土!
TEXT.Chinese: 蒙古游牧部落入侵了%s1_civ_adjective领土!
TEXT.French: The Mongol hordes have invaded %s1_civ_adjective territory!

TEXT.English: 蒙古游牧部落入侵了我国领土!
TEXT.Chinese: 蒙古游牧部落入侵了我国领土!
TEXT.French: The Mongol hordes have invaded our territory!

TEXT.English: 有新的雇佣军可供征召。
TEXT.Chinese: 有新的雇佣军可供征召。
TEXT.French: There are new mercenaries available for hiring.

TEXT.English: 你是否希望接手控制%s1文明？
TEXT.Chinese: 你是否希望接手控制%s1文明？
TEXT.French: Do you wish to take permanent control of the %s1 civilization?
A new civilization is being born

TEXT.English: [H1]一个新的文明诞生了[\H1][NEWLINE]你愿意控制%s1文明吗？
TEXT.Chinese: [H1]一个新的文明诞生了[\H1][NEWLINE]你愿意控制%s1文明吗？
TEXT.French: [H1]A new civilization is being born[\H1][NEWLINE]Do you wish to take permanent control of the %s1 civilization?

TEXT.English: 来自%s2_city的慷慨捐赠挽救了许多濒临死亡的%s4_city居民，这次无私的人道主义行动拉近了两国的关系。
TEXT.Chinese: 来自%s2_city的慷慨捐赠挽救了许多濒临死亡的%s4_city居民，这次无私的人道主义行动拉近了两国的关系。
TEXT.French: The generous people of %s2_city have donated famine relief to the endangered people of %s4_city. This humanitarian effort has brought the two nations closer together.

TEXT.English: 来自%s2_city的慷慨捐赠帮助了大批面临饥荒的%s4_city居民，这次无私的人道主义行动大幅拉近了两国的关系。
TEXT.Chinese: 来自%s2_city的慷慨捐赠帮助了大批面临饥荒的%s4_city居民，这次无私的人道主义行动大幅拉近了两国的关系。
TEXT.French: The generous people of %s2_city have donated massive famine relief to the starving people of %s4_city. This generous humanitarian effort has brought the two nations much closer together.

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective在医药方面的投资获得了回报！一项新兴特色产业正在%s2_city发展壮大，推进了民众健康和科研工作。
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective在医药方面的投资获得了回报！一项新兴特色产业正在%s2_city发展壮大，推进了民众健康和科研工作。
TEXT.French: %s1_civ_adjective investments in horticulture have paid off! A new minor industry is thriving in %s2_city, boosting health and research.

TEXT.English: 您的国教没有宗教胜利目标！
TEXT.Chinese: 您的国教没有宗教胜利目标！
TEXT.French: You lack a state religion with religious goals!

TEXT.English: %s1在%s2的传播导致市民们放弃了他们的原始神庙
TEXT.Chinese: %s1在%s2的传播导致市民们放弃了他们的原始神庙
TEXT.French: The spread of %s1 to our city of %s2 caused its citizens to abandon their Pagan Temple.

TEXT.English: %s1在%s2的传播导致市民们把他们的原始神庙转换为%s3.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1在%s2的传播导致市民们把他们的原始神庙转换为%s3.
TEXT.French: The spread of %s1 to our city of %s2 caused its citizens to repurpose their Pagan Temple as a %s3.

TEXT.English: 你想从%s1中移除哪种宗教？
TEXT.Chinese: 你想从%s1中移除哪种宗教？
TEXT.French: Which religion do you want to persecute in %s1?

TEXT.English: %s2的宗教审判把%s1从这座城市中移除。
TEXT.Chinese: %s2的宗教审判把%s1从这座城市中移除。
TEXT.French: Religious persecution in %s2 has removed %s1 from the city.

TEXT.English: 瘟疫导致居民死亡，地点：
TEXT.Chinese: 瘟疫导致居民死亡，地点：

TEXT.English: 瘟疫造成单位损失，地点：
TEXT.Chinese: 瘟疫造成单位损失，地点：
TEXT.French: Plague has killed our unit near

TEXT.English: 收缴什一税(需要%d1票，总计%d2票)
TEXT.Chinese: 收缴什一税(需要%d1票，总计%d2票)

TEXT.English: 联合国决议 - 解放%s1_city (%s2_player) (需要%d3_ReqNum，总计%d4_TotNum票)
TEXT.Chinese: 联合国决议 - 解放%s1_city (%s2_player) (需要%d3_ReqNum，总计%d4_TotNum票)
TEXT.French: UN Resolution - Decolonize %s1_city (%s2_player) (Requires %d3_ReqNum of %d4_TotNum Total Votes)

TEXT.English: 革除%s1的教籍 (需要%d2票，总计%d3票)
TEXT.Chinese: 革除%s1的教籍 (需要%d2票，总计%d3票)

TEXT.English: 对%s1_player发起十字军运动 (需要%d2_ReqNum票，总计%d3_TotNum票)
TEXT.Chinese: 对%s1_player发起十字军运动 (需要%d2_ReqNum票，总计%d3_TotNum票)

TEXT.English: 对%s1发起宗教裁判 (需要%d2票，总计%d3票)
TEXT.Chinese: 对%s1发起宗教裁判 (需要%d2票，总计%d3票)
TEXT.French: Send Inquisition to %s1 (Requires %d2 of %d3 Total Votes)

TEXT.English: 联合国决议 - 让%s1_player从%s2_civ_adjective的附庸下独立(需要%d3_ReqNum，总计%d4_TotNum票)
TEXT.Chinese: 联合国决议 - 让%s1_player从%s2_civ_adjective的附庸下独立(需要%d3_ReqNum，总计%d4_TotNum票)
TEXT.French: UN Resolution - Free %s1_player from %s2_civ_adjective Control (Requires %d3_ReqNum of %d4_TotNum Total Votes)

TEXT.English: %s1人宣布独立建国并赶走了我们的驻军。我们要给予他们自由吗？
TEXT.Chinese: %s1人宣布独立建国并赶走了我们的驻军。我们要给予他们自由吗？
TEXT.French: %s1 cities are about to declare their independence and break away from our civilization. Shall we let them go peacefully?

TEXT.English: 印刷机的发明已经推动了一波新的思潮。新教反对教皇在基督教内至高无上的权力。我们是否应该实施宗教改革？我们所有信仰天主教的城市将自动皈依新教。若我们现在实施改革，我们将迅速控制教会资产并获得500金币。
TEXT.Chinese: 印刷机的发明已经推动了一波新的思潮。新教反对教皇在基督教内至高无上的权力。我们是否应该实施宗教改革？我们所有信仰天主教的城市将自动皈依新教。若我们现在实施改革，我们将迅速控制教会资产并获得500金币。
TEXT.French: The establishment of Academia has unleashed a wave of new doctrines. Protestant churches are opposing the power of the Pope over Christian affairs. Shall we embrace the Reformation? All our Catholic cities and buildings will be converted to the new religion. If we convert now, we will receive a bonus of 500 gold for rapidly taking control of Church assets.

TEXT.English: %s1_year年第一天的太阳已经升起。%s2_civ人民决定结束游牧生活，并为你建造一座城市。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader，你的人民愿意赋予你最高的权力。并坚信你能开创一个历久弥新的文明！
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_year年第一天的太阳已经升起。%s2_civ人民决定结束游牧生活，并为你建造一座城市。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader，你的人民愿意赋予你最高的权力。并坚信你能开创一个历久弥新的文明！
TEXT.French: The sun rises on the year %s1_year. The %s2_civ people are ready to settle down and found your first city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader, your people have vested absolute power in you, trusting that you can build a Civilization to stand the test of time!

TEXT.English: 天主教会已经存在了几个世纪了。然而，教皇声称自己是地球上神的唯一代表，这行为严重影响了我们的宗教权威。 他所诠释的上帝之道偏离了基督教的原始经典，这引起了我们文明的许多牧师的担忧。我们是否应该在宗教分裂中脱离天主教会并且皈依东正教？
TEXT.Chinese: 天主教会已经存在了几个世纪了。然而，教皇声称自己是地球上神的唯一代表，这行为严重影响了我们的宗教权威。 他所诠释的上帝之道偏离了基督教的原始经典，这引起了我们文明的许多牧师的担忧。我们是否应该在宗教分裂中脱离天主教会并且皈依东正教？
TEXT.French: While Christianity has since its existence consisted of various sects, our central government could still uphold Christian Orthodoxy. But with worldly control over the Christian world fracturing, the Patriarch of %s1 has declared himself Pope and claims to be the sole representative of God on Earth. Now a theological schism divides Christianity, and several cities outside of our direct control have joined this new Catholic sect.

TEXT.English: 一支庞大的塞尔柱突厥军队正在向西横跨伊朗高原！
TEXT.Chinese: 一支庞大的塞尔柱突厥军队正在向西横跨伊朗高原！
TEXT.French: A vast army of Seljuk Turks has been spotted moving west across the Iranian Plateau!
You have acquired %d1 [ICON_GOLD] by sinking a %s2 %s3.

TEXT.English: 联合国第743号决议（全球政体-平等主义）
TEXT.Chinese: 联合国第743号决议（全球政体-平等主义）

TEXT.English: 联合国第413号决议（全球政体-多元主义）
TEXT.Chinese: 联合国第413号决议（全球政体-多元主义）

TEXT.English: 联合国第631号决议（全球政体-社会福利）
TEXT.Chinese: 联合国第631号决议（全球政体-社会福利）

TEXT.English: 联合国第3345号决议（全球政体-民主制度）
TEXT.Chinese: 联合国第3345号决议（全球政体-民主制度）

TEXT.English: 联合国第791号决议（全球政体-宪法制度）
TEXT.Chinese: 联合国第791号决议（全球政体-宪法制度）

TEXT.English: 联合国第427号决议（全球政体-世俗主义）
TEXT.Chinese: 联合国第427号决议（全球政体-世俗主义）

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]传教士无法在具有不同国教的文明中传播
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]传教士无法在具有不同国教的文明中传播
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Missionaries cannot spread in civilizations that have a different state religion

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]皈依这种宗教需要控制它的圣城
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]皈依这种宗教需要控制它的圣城
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Converting to this religion requires controlling its holy city

TEXT.English: 作为文明摇篮，我们可以选择一项免费科技：
TEXT.Chinese: 作为文明摇篮，我们可以选择一项免费科技：
TEXT.French: As the Cradle of Civilization, we can choose another free technology:
[ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Trade Route Yield per Culture Level

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]只可以建造%d1_Num个世界奇观，在%s2_LevelName文化[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]只可以建造%d1_Num个世界奇观，在%s2_LevelName文化[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only Construct %d1_Num World Wonders with %s2_LevelName Culture[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]只可以建造%d1_Num个文明奇观，在%s2_LevelName文化[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]只可以建造%d1_Num个文明奇观，在%s2_LevelName文化[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only Construct %d1_Num National Wonders with %s2_LevelName Culture[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: 每个城市能够建造%d1个世界奇观
TEXT.Chinese: 每个城市能够建造%d1个世界奇观
TEXT.French: Can build %d1 World Wonders per City

TEXT.English: 每个城市能够建造%d1个文明奇观
TEXT.Chinese: 每个城市能够建造%d1个文明奇观
TEXT.French: Can build %d1 National Wonders per City
[SPACE](%d2_num_bonus available - as much as needed for %s1_city)[SPACE]

TEXT.English: 一个 %s1_UnitName加入了我们的军队
TEXT.Chinese: 一个 %s1_UnitName加入了我们的军队

TEXT.English: 文化控制：稳定度的扩张惩罚
TEXT.Chinese: 文化控制：稳定度的扩张惩罚

TEXT.English: 文化控制：严重的稳定度扩张惩罚
TEXT.Chinese: 文化控制：严重的稳定度扩张惩罚
TEXT.French: Cultural Control: severe expansion stability penalty

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]首先完成项目将会造成无政府状态
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]首先完成项目将会造成无政府状态
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]First to complete causes Anarchy for everyone working on the project

TEXT.English: 在得知%s1在我们之前就完成了%s2，这对我们的文明是个巨大的冲击！
TEXT.Chinese: 在得知%s1在我们之前就完成了%s2，这对我们的文明是个巨大的冲击！
TEXT.French: It's been a huge shock to our civilization to learn that %s1 has managed to complete the %s2 before we could!

TEXT.English: 我们成功完成了%s1，并给了与我们竞争同一项目的%s2文明巨大的打击！
TEXT.Chinese: 我们成功完成了%s1，并给了与我们竞争同一项目的%s2文明巨大的打击！
TEXT.French: Our success in completing the %s1 has caused great shock in the %s2 civilization, who were working on the same project!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]率先完成将会使你的空军单位获得%s1经验
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]率先完成将会使你的空军单位获得%s1经验
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]First to complete receives %s1 experience for Air units

TEXT.English: 当其他文明已经完成时，获得双倍产能
TEXT.Chinese: 当其他文明已经完成时，获得双倍产能
TEXT.French: Double Production Speed when already completed by another civilization

TEXT.English: 当其他文明已经完成时，建造%d1_Mod%%更快
TEXT.Chinese: 当其他文明已经完成时，建造%d1_Mod%%更快
TEXT.French: Builds %d1_Mod%% Faster when already completed by another civilization

TEXT.English: 一颗 %s1 %s2_UnitName 已经被%s3 SDI %s4拦截!!!
TEXT.Chinese: 一颗 %s1 %s2_UnitName 已经被%s3 SDI %s4拦截!!!
TEXT.French: A %s1 %s2_UnitName has been intercepted by a %s3 SDI %s4!!!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%%F2 来自宇宙飞船产能加成
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%%F2 来自宇宙飞船产能加成

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]只可以在奴隶人口小于城市一半人口时加入城市
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]只可以在奴隶人口小于城市一半人口时加入城市
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Can join a city only if its number of slaves is less than half its population

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]只可以在卫星数量小于城市专家槽的1/5时加入城市
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]只可以在卫星数量小于城市专家槽的1/5时加入城市
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Can join a city only if its number of satellites is less than a fifth of its total specialist slots

TEXT.English: %s3文化程度下，%d1不满足建造民族奇观%d2
TEXT.Chinese: %s3文化程度下，%d1不满足建造民族奇观%d2
TEXT.French: %d1 out of %d2 National Wonders at %s3 culture

TEXT.English: %s3文化程度下，%d1不满足建造奇观%d2
TEXT.Chinese: %s3文化程度下，%d1不满足建造奇观%d2
TEXT.French: %d1 out of %d2 non-obsolete World Wonders at %s3 culture

TEXT.English: 在发现了%s1之后, 你的城市得到了%d2[ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.Chinese: 在发现了%s1之后, 你的城市得到了%d2[ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.French: After the discovery of %s1, your cities have received %d2 [ICON_FOOD]

TEXT.English: 你从占领的%s2_CityName掠夺到%d1_Num[ICON_GOLD]!!!你希望保留它吗？
TEXT.Chinese: 你从占领的%s2_CityName掠夺到%d1_Num[ICON_GOLD]!!!你希望保留它吗？
TEXT.French: You have pillaged %d1_Num [ICON_GOLD] from the capture of %s2_CityName!!! What are your next orders for our troops?

TEXT.English: 你占领了%s1_CityName!!!你希望保留它吗？
TEXT.Chinese: 你占领了%s1_CityName!!!你希望保留它吗？
TEXT.French: You have captured %s1_CityName!!! What are your next orders for our troops?

TEXT.English: 好啊！建立个新的地方政府...
TEXT.Chinese: 好啊！建立个新的地方政府...
TEXT.French: Establish control and install a new governor.
Destroy the city! Burn it all down!

TEXT.English: 洗劫这座城市！能抢多少抢多少！
TEXT.Chinese: 洗劫这座城市！能抢多少抢多少！
TEXT.French: Sack the city! Take as much as you can!

TEXT.English: 花费%d1黄金，尽快恢复秩序
TEXT.Chinese: 花费%d1黄金，尽快恢复秩序
TEXT.French: Distribute %d1 gold and see that the city is spared.

TEXT.English: %s2_CityName已完成了太空船组件――[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_PrjtName[COLOR_REVERT]。下一个项目是什么？
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_CityName已完成了太空船组件――[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_PrjtName[COLOR_REVERT]。下一个项目是什么？
TEXT.French: %s2_CityName has added [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_PrjtName[COLOR_REVERT] to the Mars colony. What would you like to work on next?

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]为所在大陆的所有城市提供清洁电力([ICON_POWER])
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]为所在大陆的所有城市提供清洁电力([ICON_POWER])
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Provides clean Power ([ICON_CLEAN_POWER]) for All Cities on this Continent
